      • authUser

        @NotNull
public User.Auth authUser​(@Nullable
                          @Nullable java.lang.String nickname,
                          @Nullable
                          @Nullable java.lang.String password)
                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: API
        When a User wants to login in.
        Specified by:
        authUser in interface API
        Parameters:
        nickname - The user nickname
        password - The user password.
        Returns:
        The uuid and a token to use when another api is called. The token doesn't expire but is unique for each user. So is possible to steal a session 🤷‍♂️.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - A UserRemoteException is thrown when there was a problem with the login.

      • createUser

        @NotNull
public User.Auth createUser​(@Nullable
                            @Nullable java.lang.String nickname,
                            @Nullable
                            @Nullable java.lang.String password)
                     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: API
        Create a new user. The user must have a unique nickname otherwise a exception is thrown.
        Specified by:
        createUser in interface API
        Parameters:
        nickname - the nickname
        password - the password
        Returns:
        The uuid and a token to use when another api is called. The token doesn't expire but is unique for each user. So is possible to steal a session 🤷‍♂️.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Thrown when the nickname is already present.

        the rooms
